title: 229. Ben Bernanke Gives Himself a Grade
description: He was handed the keys to the global economy just as it started heading off a cliff. Fortunately, he'd seen this movie before.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: He was handed the keys to the global economy just as it started heading off a cliff. Fortunately, he'd seen this movie before.
